item.title: Step by step guide - How to Create Bot on Coze
item.author: Chloe
item.description: What is Coze? Coze is an AI chatbot and app editorial development platform launched by ByteDance. By integrating several plug-ins, Coze’s Bot capabilities are greatly expanded and can be applied to various scenarios, such as chatbot, data analytics, and content collection. Coze page introduction After successfully registering and entering Coze, on the homepage, you will first see an assistant bot, which will guide you step by step to understand the features and functions of Coze.
